title: Hoist Hanger Celebrates 15,000th Set Installed
text:
Hoist Hanger Celebrates 15,000th Set Installed 
Hoist Hanger, manufacturer of patented automotive lift accessories, recently celebrated the sale and installation of its 15,000th Hoist Hanger. Starting just three and a half years ago, Hoist Hanger has quickly become the darling of the automotive safety equipment market. 
Canada , 29 September 2015 -- 
Hoist Hanger Celebrates 15,000th Set Installed 
Employee safety in the automotive service industry has reached a new, higher standard. Hoist Hanger’s unique products allow technicians to remove and re-install today’s heavy wheel and tire combinations, with no need to bend down at the waist, thereby virtually eliminating back strain and injury. Hoist Hanger recently celebrated the 15,000th installation of its breakthrough automotive service safety and productivity products. New car dealership groups, with their large number of technicians, are able to greatly reduce Workers’ Compensation claims and the resulting increased premiums by installing Hoist Hangers on all their service department lifts. Rick Daley, President of Hoist Hanger, has been involved with the automotive service industry for decades and is keenly aware of how injuries to mechanics have cost car dealerships and automotive service departments billions of dollars in lost productivity and Workers’ Compensation claims and premiums. Hoist Hanger’s products are specifically designed to address these issues and have been embraced by mechanics, managers and owners all across the United States as a result. “The feedback has been outstanding and the improved statistics speak for themselves”, noted Daley. Bruce Bledsoe, a 25-year car service professional with Honda noted, “I wanted to take the time to tell you how great your product is. It has made quite a difference in our shop. The quality is number one.” Hoist Hanger products are available now at HoistHanger.com and by phoning 1-888-913-1657. About the company: Hoist Hanger is based near Vancouver, BC, with a U.S. warehouse in Bellingham, WA. Hoist Hanger designs, manufactures, sells and distributes automotive vehicle lift accessories throughout North America. These patented products are designed to reduce or eliminate back, neck and shoulder strains/injuries associated with repetitive lifting of vehicle wheels and tires in automotive repair facilities. The company’s customers include many of the leading new car dealerships and automotive repair chains. # # #
